content.question: Which of the following factors contributes most to the data in the line graph?

choices.label: Challengers have easier access to television, magazines, and newspapers.
Incumbents have an advantage over challengers because of name recognition.
Incumbents are often at a disadvantage because they are too busy working on legislation to campaign.
Challengers are often given larger donations from interest groups and can outspend incumbents.

content.answer: Incumbents have an advantage over challengers because of name recognition.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
